title: (x) Mars candy bar logo - custom designed {Jan E}
content:
the font for Mars Bar for a project at Uni.

Many thanks in advance

Daisydaye

author: daisydaye

comments.content: Please post an image or a link.
I have posted one for your information. Thank you

That’s custom.

Can’t think of anything that would come close right now.
Definitely custom. Most Hershey's and Mars products are.
Would you know of anything that is similar then please?

Maybe take a look at Crillee.

- Lex
The chunky serifs of [Italia](http://web.archive.org/web/20101016165253/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/italia_std_bold/) might get you close enough.
